Related repos

  • multimodal LLM inference engine in Rust and Python
  • Toolkit for serving and running large language models through an inference server
  • Multimodal LLM inference engine for mobile devices
  • Open-source toolkit for building scalable LLM inference infrastructure
  • Fast text embeddings inference server for popular open source models
  • Controls drones with natural language through LLMs
  • Code and tutorials for building large language models from scratch in PyTorch
  • Skywork R1V: multimodal reasoning model extending R1-series LLMs to images and text, open-source, efficient transfer, 38B parameters
  • Survey of unified multimodal models
